backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state; serves as a minimal backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: updating the organization name in Hindi content and English transliteration across frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the NGO website structure, components, and content with the updated organization name 'जन कल्याण संगठन'.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system with warm saffron/orange and green palette, supporting both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with bilingual title 'जन कल्याण संगठन - Jan Kalyan Sangathan' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the single-page NGO website layout with header, seven content sections, footer, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component displaying bilingual organization name, tagline, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo, organization name, responsive navigation menu for seven sections, and smooth scroll functionality for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with info cards (email, phone, address) and a demo form with validation, simulated submission, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/sections/GoalSec: Goal section displaying the target of 1,00,000 honest partners with prominent card styling and supporting content about unity and honesty.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background image overlay, large organization name, tagline, inspirational quote, and scroll-to-welcome call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/sections/MemberR: React component that renders a member registration form with fields for name, phone, email, district/state, and message. Includes client-side validation, simulated form submission with success feedback, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/sections/OneRupe: React component displaying the "₹1 Support" section explaining how collective micro-donations work. Renders content from Hindi content file in a card layout with a Coins icon.
frontend/src/components/sections/ValuesS: React component showcasing the organization's four core values (Unity, Transparency, Humanity, Justice) with icons, cards, and Hindi text from the content file.
frontend/src/components/sections/Welcome: React component displaying welcome message, organizational quote, mission statement, and three mission highlights (Community Support, Legal Aid, Humanitarian Approach) with icons and cards.
frontend/src/content/hi.ts: Content configuration file exporting Hindi language strings for the NGO website including organization name, mission, values, tagline, and one-rupee support explanation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook file for future backend data fetching integration; currently returns an empty object.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a saffron/orange color palette for light and dark modes, plus base styling for smooth scrolling and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining dark mode, content paths, custom theme extensions including color system using OKLCH, typography, container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting an NGO website for "डिजिटल भारत एकता संगठन" with 9 existing features including responsive layout, Hindi content display, visual theming, contact form, static images, and a ₹1 contribution explanation section, plus one known domain validation issue with Hindi characters.
